name: Cheesy Asparagus Snack
author: RockyMtnLady
summary: I love this quick asparagus recipe. Easy to make as a snack or light lunch.
ingredients: 6  asparagus spears, ends trimmed, cut into 1-inch pieces
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Bring water to a boil in a saucepan
Cook asparagus until bright green and still crisp, 1 to 2 minutes
Drain asparagus and rinse under cold water to stop cooking
Stir mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese, and dry mustard together in a bowl
Beat egg whites in a glass, metal, or ceramic bowl until stiff peaks form, 2 to 4 minutes; fold into mayonnaise mixture
Place pre-baked pizza crust onto a baking sheet, arrange asparagus on crust, and spoon mayonnaise mixture on top
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly brown, 8 to 10 minutes
